mapper.select: SELECT MAIN_MENU_NAME mainMenuName, MAIN_MENU_PAGE mainMenuPage, SUB_MENU_NAME subMenuName, SUB_MENU_PAGE subMenuPage FROM SUB_MENU JOIN MAIN_MENU ON(SUB_MAIN_MENU = MAIN_MENU_PAGE)
SELECT COUNT(USER_ID) FROM USER_PERSONAL_INFO WHERE USER_ID=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_PERSONAL_INFO( USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_BIRTH, USER_GENDER ) VALUES ( #{userID}, #{userPWD}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userBirth}, #{userGender} )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTR(MOVIE_SCREENING_DATE,6,5) AS SCREENING_DATE, MOVIE_THEATHER, SUBSTR(MOVIE_SCREENING_DATE,12,5) AS SCREENING_TIME, MOVIE_TITLE FROM MOVIE_SCREENING_PRICE ORDER BY SCREENING_DATE ASC, MOVIE_TITLE ASC, SCREENING_DATE ASC
SELECT USER_ID FROM USER_PERSONAL_INFO WHERE USER_NAME = #{param1} AND USER_BIRTH = #{param2} AND USER_GENDER = #{param3}

SELECT USER_ID as userID, USER_PWD as userPWD, USER_NAME as userName, USER_GENDER as userGender, USER_BIRTH as userBirth, USER_EMAIL as userEmail, USER_REGDATE as userRegDate, USER_STATES as userStates FROM USER_PERSONAL_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{myInfoID}
